entry.title: New release for Recommendarr: Release 1.2.3 - Tautulli Support
entry.content:
## Tautulli Integration

  • Added full Tautulli support for enhanced watch history analysis
  • Integrated Tautulli watch history into recommendation system
  • Added dedicated Tautulli connection page in settings
  • View recent watch history from Tautulli in recommendations interface

## AI Service Improvements

  • Removed API key requirement for local LLM services like LM Studio
  • Better support for OpenAI-compatible API endpoints that don't require authentication
  • Improved connection handling for various API formats

## Performance Improvements

  • Removed API request timeouts throughout the application
  • Added support for longer LLM inference times needed by larger models
  • Fixed timeout issues when connecting to LM Studio and other local LLMs
  • More reliable handling of network latency for all services

## Other Changes

  • Added Tautulli documentation to README
  • Improved error messages for connection issues
  • Fixed various UI glitches in settings screens
  • Better error handling for API requests

# Tautulli Configuration Section

entry.title: New release for Recommendarr: Release 1.2.365 - Docker Improvements & Bugfixes
entry.content:
Docker Improvements

  • Consolidated to a single Docker image for simplified deployment
  • Fixed bug in docker deploying causing the proxy api to fail.
  • Added Docker Desktop setup guide with UI-based container creation
  • Various other tweaks to suit a wide range of setups.

## Package Updates

  • Updated core dependencies including axios, core-js, Vue, and Express etc..

## AI Setup Improvements

  • Fixed bugs with model selection and persistence
  • Fixed bug with duplicate model selection elements on recommendations page(s)
  • Consistent clearing of form data so text fields are always correct.

## LLM Prompt improvements - Testing out a more refined prompt for generating recommendations.

## Reverse Proxy Support (Must Build The Image Locally)

  • Added inital support for using a Reverse Proxy.
    • Due to the current app limitations....you must build and pass in the appropriate arguments locally to generate an image setup for your reverse proxy.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fingerthief/recommendarr/compare/1.2.363...1.2.365
